Introduction

Kim Hyojung, popularly known as Hyolyn, is a South-Korean singer and songwriter under Bridge Company. She is best known as the former leader and main vocalist of the girl group SISTAR and its sub-unit SISTAR19. She made her solo debut on November 26, 2013 with the album "Love&Hate".
